channel.title: Making my own *PRIVATE* server
channel.description:
I want to make a server that can ONLY be accessed through my computer, and is stored on my computer. But all of the guides that I have seen so far are only for servers that can be shared with others, IE - hamachi or no-ip servers.
Can anyone tell me how to make a bog standard runescape game on my computer. I have a source and the moparscape client.
Thanks a lot for your time and help.

item.title: Making my own *PRIVATE* server
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

ok if you want too get a server too work you have too get a base one that i recommend is
(Testscape Source) By: Nvi Ible

http://rapidshare.com/files/14164676/TestScape_Source.rar.html

Read full topic

item.title: Making my own *PRIVATE* server
item.dc:creator: @ecopetition ecopetition
item.description:
@ecopetition wrote:

Sorry but I heard that there was a way to get a source and the moparscape client and combine them to make runescape offline, do you know that method?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 31, 2007, 03:14:07 PM[/size][hr]Please help

Read full topic

item.title: Making my own *PRIVATE* server
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

Ok so you want one you can only play on? Try hybridscape.

Open hamachi, Click start server. Go back & play. If you get error connecting update your Java.

Read full topic
